verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5804>Gaza.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> rise <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>north,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and shall <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>flood,<s%> and shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> that is therein; the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein: then the <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H3213>howl.<s%>

At the <S%H4480>noise<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of the <S%H8161>stamping<s%> of the <S%H6541>hooves<s%> of his <S%H47>strong<s%> horses, at the <S%H4480>rushing<s%> <S%H7494><s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and at the <S%H1995>rumbling<s%> of his <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> the <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> look <S%H6437>back<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H4480>feebleness<s%> <S%H7510><s%> of <S%H3027>hands;<s%>

Because <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H935>cometh<s%> to <S%H7703>spoil<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> and <S%H6721>Zidon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5826>helper<s%> that <S%H8300>remaineth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7703>spoil<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H339>country<s%> of <S%H3731>Caphtor.<s%>

Baldness <S%H7144><s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza;<s%> <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> is cut <S%H1820>off<s%> with the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of their <S%H6010>valley:<s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> wilt thou cut <S%H1413>thyself?<s%>

O <S%H1945><s%> thou <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H575><s%> will it be <S%H3808>ere<s%> thou be <S%H8252>quiet?<s%> put up <S%H622>thyself<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> thy <S%H8593>scabbard,<s%> <S%H7280>rest,<s%> and be <S%H1826>still.<s%>

How <S%H349><s%> can it be <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> seeing the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath given it a <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>shore?<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> hath he <S%H3259>appointed<s%> it.
